name: webdriver-cypress-
description: e2e - arquivos de testes - .spec.js fixtures - dados e arquivos de mocks support - arquivos auxiliares e de suporte ao teste

scripts.clean:reports: rm -R -f cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test: npm run scripts || npm run posttest
